application.ref: A machine learning software for extracting information from scholarly documents

text.p: The highest bioturbation coefficient determined by the model was 4 cm2 yr-1 for St. 3 at 12 S (Table S2). Rates were extremely high at the shallowest stations (1200 and 1800 g m-2 yr-1 at 11 and 12 S, respectively).
